title: WSAG Meetup #1
description: Join us for the inaugural Warsaw Software Architecture Group meetup! Agenda and speakers to be announced soon.
longDescription:
We're excited to launch the Warsaw Software Architecture Group with our first meetup! This event will feature three excellent presentations covering software architecture topics. Stay tuned for speaker announcements and detailed agenda.

This is a great opportunity to meet fellow software architects, share knowledge, and build our local architecture community.

agenda.title: Presentation Slot 1
agenda.description: Speaker and topic to be announced

agenda.title: Presentation Slot 2
agenda.description: Speaker and topic to be announced

agenda.title: Presentation Slot 3
agenda.description: Speaker and topic to be announced

title: Event-Driven Architecture in Practice
description: Real-world implementation of event-driven systems with Apache Kafka and event streaming.
longDescription: Explore how event-driven architecture can transform your application design and enable real-time data processing at scale. This session covered practical implementation strategies using Apache Kafka, event streaming patterns, and lessons learned from production systems.

speakers.name: Michał Nowak
speakers.bio: Michał is the CTO at StartupXYZ where he leads the technical vision for event-driven platforms. He has extensive experience with Kafka, event streaming, and building resilient distributed systems.

agenda.title: Event-Driven Architecture Fundamentals
agenda.speaker: Michał Nowak
agenda.description: Core concepts and benefits of event-driven systems

agenda.title: Apache Kafka in Production
agenda.speaker: Michał Nowak
agenda.description: Real-world Kafka implementation and best practices

agenda.title: Event Streaming Patterns
agenda.speaker: Michał Nowak
agenda.description: Common patterns and anti-patterns in event streaming

title: Domain-Driven Design Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop on applying DDD principles to complex business domains.
longDescription: A comprehensive hands-on workshop exploring Domain-Driven Design principles and their practical application in complex business scenarios. Participants worked through real-world examples, learned strategic and tactical DDD patterns, and practiced event storming techniques.

speakers.name: Katarzyna Wiśniewska
speakers.bio: Katarzyna specializes in domain modeling and has helped numerous organizations implement DDD successfully. She is a certified DDD practitioner and regular conference speaker.

agenda.title: DDD Strategic Patterns
agenda.speaker: Katarzyna Wiśniewska
agenda.description: Bounded contexts, ubiquitous language, and context mapping

agenda.title: Tactical DDD Patterns
agenda.speaker: Katarzyna Wiśniewska
agenda.description: Aggregates, entities, value objects, and domain services
